```{r}
#| results: "asis"

#| eval: false
source("../_common.R")
suppressMessages(suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("Seurat")))
suppressMessages(library("magrittr"))
```

```{r}
#| eval: false

sample <- readRDS("/omics/odcf/analysis/OE0145_projects/idh_gliomas/Figures_Science/revision/IDH_gliomas_book/datasets/integrated_paired_AS.rds")

cluster_cols <- c("RE" = "#ECA809",
                  "OPC-like" = "#043362",                    
                  "T Cell" = "#009FF5",                   
                  "Oligodendrocytes" = "#BC5210",            
                  "Astrocytes" = "#279185",                  
                  "Microglia" = "#7EB356",                   
                  "Pericytes" = "#AC70FF",                  
                  "Mixed" = "#8d5d3f",                   
                  "Gradient" = "#D6D6D6",                    
                  "Neurons" = "#544B81",                   
                  "Endothelial" = "#da627d",                 
                  "Astro-like" = "#9A031E",                 
                  "Cycling" = "#5F0F40")

sample$relabelling[sample$relabelling == "RA"] <- "RE"
Seurat::Idents(sample) <- sample$relabelling
```

```{r}
#| eval: false
p1 <- SCpubr::do_BoxPlot(sample = sample, 
                         feature = "nCount_RNA", 
                         group.by = "relabelling", 
                         order = TRUE, 
                         colors.use = cluster_cols,
                         boxplot.linewidth = 0.5,
                         font.size = 10) + 
       ggplot2::labs(x = "Cell Identities",
                     y = "Number of UMIs/cell")

p2 <- SCpubr::do_BoxPlot(sample = sample, 
                         feature = "nFeature_RNA", 
                         group.by = "relabelling", 
                         order = TRUE, 
                         colors.use = cluster_cols,
                         boxplot.linewidth = 0.5,
                         font.size = 10) + 
       ggplot2::labs(x = "Cell Identities",
                     y = "Number of genes/cell")

p3 <- SCpubr::do_BoxPlot(sample = sample, 
                         feature = "percent.mt", 
                         group.by = "relabelling", 
                         order = TRUE, 
                         colors.use = cluster_cols,
                         boxplot.linewidth = 0.5,
                         font.size = 10) + 
       ggplot2::labs(x = "Cell Identities",
                     y = "Pct. Mitochondrial RNA/cell")

p <- p1 / p2 / p3
```

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
SCpubr::save_Plot(p,
                  figure_path = "/omics/odcf/analysis/OE0145_projects/idh_gliomas/Figures_Science/revision/IDH_gliomas_book/figs/Figure_S2G",
                  file_name = "Figure_S2G",
                  dpi = 300,
                  output_format = "publication",
                  width = 8,
                  height = 6.75)
```
